originalText.text: Both of my children have taken classes at Swim Jim for over 6 years and they have loved every minute of it. I give Swim Jim  particularly high marks in customer service as anytime I've had a question or concern they have responded immediately with a constructive solution. They emphasize developing swimmers who have strong technique with a lot of correction until a student masters what is appropriate for their age and level. My oldest is ready to try out for a team and I feel confident that he has a solid foundation so all he has to focus on is building speed. Great program, great teachers, and great fun.

originalText.text:
I have had children swimming with SwimJim for 24 years. The swim instruction system Jim has developed is exceptional and the instructors Jim and Kelli find and train are peerless. Each instructor is diligent, thoughtful, kind and fun. This was not my experience when I first tried other programs.
My sons, now in college, thought of Jim and his staff as family. My daughter has autism, but that did not deter Jim and his staff. They conferred with her therapists and teachers, and continue to do so, in order to create a swim program that addresses her behaviors and her complicated way of learning. She is a terrific swimmer now and thinks of Kelli as her best friend. When Kelli is away, instructors she has trained step into the pool beautifully.
I have watched children (and a few adults) for all these years happily learning to swim, improving their skills, and becoming, in some cases, Olympic-level swimmers, and, in other cases, thrilled recreational swimmers, I could not recommend anyone for any task more highly than I do the people at SwimJim.

She is a terrific swimmer now and thinks of Kelli as her best friend. When Kelli is away, instructors she has trained step into the pool beautifully.
I have watched children (and a few adults) for all these years happily learning to swim, improving their skills, and becoming, in some cases, Olympic-level swimmers, and, in other cases, thrilled recreational swimmers, I could not recommend anyone for any task more highly than I do the people at SwimJim.

originalText.text: When it was time for my son, who was very fearful, to learn to swim, we tried three different learn-to-swim programs before finally discovering Swim Jim. What a game changer! His first instructor Will was the most patient, confidence-inspiring, encouraging teacher. He got my child into the pool, soothed his fears, instilled trust, and most importantly taught him to swim. The progressive instructive methodology was developed with great knowledge and care and leads the children develop amazing technique. We have continued with Swim Jim for several years and my son is a brilliant swimmer of all the strokes, even butterfly!

originalText.text: We've had a great experience with SwimJim. Our daughter's instructor, Kyle, has been amazing. He really pushes our daughter yet keeps it fun. This has produced great results and much improvement in her skills. As an ex-swimmer and ex-swim instructor for all ages I really am impressed with Kyle and SwimJim's teaching philosophy.

text.text: We've had a great experience with SwimJim. Our daughter's instructor, Kyle, has been amazing. He really pushes our daughter yet keeps it fun. This has produced great results and much improvement in her skills. As an ex-swimmer and ex-swim instructor for all ages I really am impressed with Kyle and SwimJim's teaching philosophy.

originalText.text: SwimJim has teaching kids to swim down to a science. The instruction is very consistent even between different instructors. They are excited and serious at the same time, and very aware of developmental needs of children. Both of my children who are now 3.5 and 5.5 have been swimming with SJ for the past two years. They love the water and are confident swimmers with a desire to become even more independent in the water.
